string.name: snowglobe_processing_message
string.translation_description: In-progress message on dialog shown when a customised snow globe/ornament is being created on the device.

resources.string: Tạo đồ trang trí của bạn!

string.name: snowglobe_take_picture_button
string.translation_description: Label for button that opens the camera to take a photo. Short 1-2 word string

string.name: snowglobe_retry_picture_button
string.translation_description: Label for button that takes a new photo and discards the old one. Short 1-2 word string

string.name: snowglobe_exit_button
string.translation_description: Content description for button that exists a screen

string.name: snowglobe_share_title
string.translation_description: Title for share dialog from which a user generated snow globe can be shared.

resources.string: Chia sẻ snowglobe của bạn bằng cách sử dụng...

string.name: snowglobe_share_message
string.translation_description: Label for button that starts processing of the customised snow globe into a sharable image
